listingText: Introducing 3125 Harper St—a stunning residence offering 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 spa-inspired bathrooms within 1,250 sq ft of meticulously crafted living space. This exquisite home showcases premium finishes throughout, from gleaming hardwood floors to designer fixtures and custom cabinetry. The open-concept layout is ideal for effortless entertaining, complemented by abundant natural light and sophisticated architectural details. Step outside to a private, beautifully landscaped oasis perfect for serene relaxation or intimate gatherings. Located in an exclusive neighborhood, 3125 Harper St epitomizes refined living with unparalleled comfort and style. Experience elevated luxury every day in this exceptional property—where elegance meets modern convenience. Schedule your private tour today.

Welcome home to 3125 Harper St! This charming 3-bedroom, 2-bath gem offers 1,250 sq ft of comfortable living space perfect for your next chapter. Bright and airy, with an open layout that’s great for entertaining or cozy family nights. The kitchen is ready for your culinary adventures, and the bedrooms provide plenty of space to unwind. Outside, enjoy a lovely yard ideal for weekend BBQs or just relaxing with a book. Located in a friendly neighborhood close to shops, parks, and schools, this home has it all. Ready to make it yours? Let’s chat!
